properties.title: The pumptrack at the Sports Center Mulets Silvaplana
properties.abstract: The mobile pumptrack circuit at the Sports Center Mulets in Silvaplana offers tracks for bikes, inline skates, skateboards and scooters. Riders of all ages can let off steam on the track and improve their skills.
properties.description:
The 70 meter long pumptrack is part of the Mulets Sports Center since 2014 and lies next to the camping area. The track opens when the snow melts in spring and closes in autumn. The pumptrack has curves, basins and waves and allows beginners and advanced riders to improve their skills and, above all, to have a lot of fun. The track does not require any special previous skills. Come and give it a try and have fun. 

The use of the site is free. Every rider is responsible for his or her own security. Those who need a change can enjoy the additional sport facilities, such as the skate park, the tennis courts, the beach volleyball court, the childrenâ€™s playground and the kite center. Make sure to stop by at the excellent Restaurant Pizzeria Mulets.
